column4: ok I'm about to install windows 7, I'v alread got ubuntu 12.04 installed on my drive
I'm wondering if I should install windows at the beginning of my drive partition or after ubuntu
basically does it matter where I install windows7
which partition before or after isn't terribly important, which order (time) you install in can make it easier or harder (may need to reinstall grub if you install windows after ubuntu)
